title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key in the properties file is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key blank while providing a valid value. 3. Add the key with the blank value to the chart. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
